name: Game Dev Midterm - Children's Library
description:
Midterm - Children's Library

Find all the books and place them on the correct shelves.

WASD to move.

Press E to pick up and drop objects.

by Samuel Hill

This game is about my time doing community service at a children's library as an assistant for the librarian. It mostly consisted of observing the children's classes and organizing the books that were donated. I choose this as my experience because I couldn't think of much else in my life that I could gamify.

I thought that messing around with the many objects, trying to find bugs, was the most fun part about making this. Modeling was probably the least fun thing to do. In that same thought, the hardest thing to do was mostly art because it takes a lot of time. The easiest thing to do was most likely implementing sounds and text in conjunction with the main mechanic of placing books.
